info.name: Matte Charcoal Dark Theme Firefox 57+
info.description: A dark theme for Firefox Quantum 57+. Inspired by the matte charcoal Lamborghini Aventador LP700. I love the 3D effect the subtle gradient delivers over the flat design of the other new FF Quantum themes I've seen. Copy CSS to a blank userChrome.css file and enjoy!
info.additionalInfo: This theme will no longer install via stylish. Simply copy and paste the CSS code into a blank text document. Save it as userChrome.css and place it inside the chrome folder of your FireFox user profile folder.
